full_summary:
# **Electric Vehicle Supply Equipment (EVSE) Tender Announcement**
## *No. 5P420-24-0184/A*

### **Tender Description:**

Parks Canada Agency invites qualified suppliers to submit a tender for the supply of Electric Vehicle Supply Equipment (EVSE) for delivery to Lake Louise, Alberta.

**Tender Summary:**
- **Contract Number:** 5P420-24-0184/A
- **Tender Closing Date:** December 3, 2024, at 16:00:00
- **Expected Contract Start Date:** December 10, 2024
- **Expected Contract End Date:** February 28, 2025
- **Location of Delivery:** Lake Louise, Alberta

### **Tender Requirements:**

Parks Canada Agency requires 21 "Group 1, Level 2, Subgroup 1-B Networked EVSE" for delivery to Lake Louise, Alberta. The requested delivery date for the above-mentioned goods is February 28, 2025.

### **Pre-Qualification:**
To participate in this bidding process, suppliers must hold a Supply Arrangement (SA) under the Request (RFSA) E60HN-21EVSE/B. Suppliers who wish to become a pre-qualified supplier under this RFSA, should refer to the following link: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities/tender-notice/pw-hn-373-80467

### **Debriefing:**

Bidders may request a debriefing on the results of the bid solicitation within 15 working days from receipt of notification that their bid was unsuccessful.

### **Contact Information:**

For any inquiries or submission of tenders, please contact:
Terry Imm
Phone: (250) 837-1659
Email: terry.imm@pc.gc.ca

### **Cancellation and Unsolicitude:** 

This tender announcement may be cancelled or unsolicited at any time without notification to any supplier. All bidders submit tenders to this proposal are required to adhere to the terms and conditions of purchasing policies and practices as outlined in the request.

### **Amendment:**
No amendments have been made to this tender announcement. Please check the Canada Buys website for any changes or updates to this tender notice. [Available at](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities/tender-notice/pw-hn-373-80467).

**Please
